logo.alt: Blues Jab - Boy Band of the Blues

songs.title: All That I Can Do Is Sing The Blues

lyrics: You’ve got me where you want me
You’ve got me on the floor
I’ve had my share of troubles
But I ain’t been down here before
You used to say you loved me
But now I don’t believe that that was true
You’ve got me where you want me
And all that I can do is sing the blues
You’ve been spending all my money
Now I haven’t got a dime
I didn’t care one penny
’Cos I thought that you were mine
Now I see through you
And I don’t believe that that was ever true
Now I’m sad and broke and lonely
And all that I can do is sing the blues
Why’d you go throwing those sticks and stones
Giving me the third degree?
I know that there’s no going back
But you still matter to me
#SOLO
I lent you my car / You didn’t bring it back
Now I’m mourning for my 1956 Cadillac
I’ve been walking so long
I’ve got holes in both soles of my shoes
(It’s true)
Now I’m a long way from home
And all that I can do is sing the blues
#Turnaround, break, stop on 1/13

songs.title: I Remember You
songs.notes:
Intro on D string 
Close: Signal end

lyrics: My name is Junior / From Memphis, Tennessee
My daddy was a hustler / And a stranger to me
I don’t always know / What’s the right thing to say
But do I look familiar / In any kind of way?
I remember you / Dancin’ on the floor
I remember you / Walkin’ out the door
You had a red dress on / And some high heel shoes
You don’t remember me / But I remember you
You had a margarita, I had a beer
I wondered what a woman like you / Was doing way downhere
You tore my heart apart / The moment you left
And Junior had a night / He would never forget
I remember you / Dancin’ on the floor
I remember you / Walkin’ out the door
You had a red dress on / And some high heel shoes
You don’t remember me / But I remember you
Well maybe I was just a number
A face without a name
Now and then I wonder
Will I ever be the same?
I remember you / Dancin’ on the floor
I remember you / Walkin’ out the door
You had a red dress on / And some high heel shoes
You don’t remember me / But I remember you
You don’t remember me / But I remember you
#Ad lib over vamp
#MK signal end
I’m a cross cut saw
Just drag me ’cross your log (x2)
I cut your wood so easy for you
You can’t help but say ’Hot dog!’
Some call me wood-choppin’ Sam
Some call me wood-cuttin’ Jim
Last girl I cut the wood for, you know
She wants me back again
I’m a cross cut saw
Just drag me ’cross your log
I cut your wood so easy for you
You can’t help but say ’Hot dog!’
#SOLO x2
I’ve got a double-bladed axe / That really cuts good
I’m a cross cut saw / Baby bury me in your wood
I’m a cross cut saw
Just drag me ’cross your log
I cut your wood so easy for you
You can’t help but say ’Hot dog!’
I’m a cross cut saw
Just drag me ’cross your log (x2)
I cut your wood so easy for you
You can’t help but say ’Hot dog!’
#SOLO x2
⇒ STOP on 1/13
Well, they call her Lady Luck ...
She gave me only famine ...
I’m getting nowhere
And nowhere is a bad place to be
Try to help myself ...
I can’t pay the landlord ...
I wanna be a winner ...
I’ve gone to nothing
And nothing is a bad way to be
I’m down instead of up ...
#SOLO
I’ve got to check the dealer...
If I try to climb the ladder ...
I’ve got nothing
And nothing ain’t enough for me
Got to take my lousy luck
And drown it in a sack
I’m taking
#BREAK
one step forward and two steps back
One step forward, two steps back (x4)
#SOLO
One step forward, two steps back (x4)
Help the poor
Won’t you help poor me?
I need help from you, baby
Need it desperately
I need you so much, I need your care
Need all the loving, baby, you can spare
Help the poor
Oh baby, won’t you help poor me?
Say you will
Say you’ll help me on
I can’t make it no longer
In this world alone
I’m begging baby, with tears in my eyes
For your love, don’t you realise
I need help
Oh baby, help poor me
You are my inspiration
Baby, that make me be a king
But if you don’t come to my rescue
I couldn’t ever be anything
Hey, help the poor
Won’t you help poor me?
Have a heart, won’t you baby?
Listen to my plea
Oh, I lost my courage till I found you
You’ve got what it takes, baby, to pull me through
Help the poor
Oh baby, won’t you help poor me?
#SOLO x 2
You are my inspiration
Baby, that make me be a king
But if you don’t come to my rescue
I couldn’t ever be anything
Hey, help the poor
Won’t you help poor me?
Have a heart, won’t you baby?
Listen to my plea
Oh, I lost my courage till I found you
You’ve got what it takes, baby, to pull me through
Help the poor
Oh baby, won’t you help poor me?
#SOLO x1 ⇒ STOP on 1/17
Help the poor
Won’t you help poor me?
I need help from you, baby
Need it desperately
I need you so much...
I need you so much, I need your care
Need all the loving, baby, you can spare
Help the poor
Oh baby, won’t you help poor me?
Say you will
Say you’ll help me on
I can’t make it no longer
In this world alone
#I’m begging baby...
I’m begging baby, with tears in my eyes
For your love, don’t you realise
I need help
Oh baby, help poor me
You are my inspiration
Baby, that make me be a king
But if you don’t come to my rescue
I couldn’t ever be anything
Hey, help the poor
Won’t you help poor me?
Have a heart, won’t you baby?
Listen to my plea
#Oh, I lost my courage...
Oh, I lost my courage till I found you
You’ve got what it takes, baby, to pull me through
Help the poor
Oh baby, won’t you help poor me?
You are my inspiration
Baby, that make me be a king
But if you don’t come to my rescue
I couldn’t ever be anything
Hey, help the poor
Won’t you help poor me?
Have a heart, won’t you baby?
Listen to my plea
#Oh, I lost my courage...
Oh, I lost my courage till I found you
You’ve got what it takes, baby, to pull me through
Help the poor
Oh baby, won’t you help poor me?
#SOLO x1 ⇒ STOP on 1/17
Well I came home one mornin’
Found my baby gone
You know I always
Used to lived alone
I love her, oh yes I love her
Sho’ Nuff I Do
First time I saw her
On a Friday night
I told her baby
I told everything was alright
I love her, oh yes I love her
Sho’ Nuff I Do
I saw her one mornin’
She was goin’ round the street
She was shakin’ hands
With every man she meet
I love her, oh yes I love her
Sho’ Nuff I Do
#SOLO x2
I raise my hands
And I raise the once again
Please tell me, Baby
Tell me that you understand
That I love you, oh yes I love you
Sho’ Nuff I Do
Sho’ Nuff I Do
The thrill is gone
The thrill is gone away (x2)
You know you done me wrong, baby
And you’ll be sorry someday
The thrill is gone
The thrill is gone away from me (x2)
Although I’ll still live on
But so lonely I’ll be
#SOLO x2
The thrill is gone
The thrill is gone away for good (x2)
Someday I know I’ll be over it all, baby
Just like I know a man should
Now I’m free
I’m free from your spell (x2)
And now that it’s all over
All I can do is wish you well
#SOLO
#Stop 1/13

songs.title: Thinkin’ ’Bout You
songs.notes: Close: 2 Soli, bass outro without stop

lyrics: I’ve thinking ’bout you, baby
Thinking ’bout you since you’ve been gone (x2)
When you were here I didn’t think about you at all
Maybe that’s what I did wrong
I’ve been dreaming about you, baby
Dreaming you were by my side (x2)
Dreaming we were both still so happy
And I was not the one who lied.
#SOLO x 2
You been talking ’bout me, baby
Sayin’ I did not treat you right (x2)
Now folks avoid me on the street
And my bed don’t shake at night
Goodbye pretty baby
I know that you’ve been here and gone
Goodbye pretty baby
I know that I’ve done you wrong
Now I’ll be sitting on my front porch
Bidin’ time with Jimmy John
#SOLO x2
#BASS OUTRO on 2nd SOLO (no stop)
Oh baby, don’t you want a man like me?
I said baby, don’t you want a man like me?
I could give you so much loving
More than a woman ever seen
Now come on baby, let’s make some love tonight
I said baby, let’s make some love tonight
We’ll be rolling out the blankets
I’m going to make you feel alright
#THEME
#SOLO - MARK
I’m your rollin’ man
Gonna give you all the love you need (x2)
I’ve got so much loving
More than you ever going to see
#THEME
ONE, TWO, THREE, FOUR
#Shuffle solo x 2 (Wolfgang)
#THEME ⇒ STOP!
Mustang Sally
Guess you better slow Your Mustang down
Mustang Sally, my baby
Guess you better slow Your Mustang down
You been runnin’ all over town,
Oh, I guess I have to put your flat feet on the ground
All you wanna do is ride around Sally
One of these early mornings
I’m gonna be wipin’ your weepin’ eyes
#SOLO - Mark
I bought you a brand-new Mustang
It was a nineteen sixty-five
Now you come around, a signifying’ a woman
Girl you won’t, you won’t, let me ride
Mustang Sally, now baby
Guess you better slow that Mustang down
You been runnin’ all over town
I guess you have to put your flat feet on the ground
#SOLO - Wolfgang
All you wanna do is ride around Sally
One of these early mornings
I’m gonna be wipin’ your weepin’ eyes
Those weeping eyes
When I’m cold and shaking
Like a cat in the rain...
When I’m down in the flood and I
can sink or I can swim ...
Can l lean on you ...
When life is hard?
Can l lean on you ...
When life is hard?
Oh, and life is hard
When the debt collector
Comes knocking at my door...
When my only child says I
Should not call her name...
Can l lean on you ...
When life is hard?
Can l lean on you ...
When life is hard?
Oh, and life is hard
When the boss says
She don’t need me no more
When my landlord throws me out of my place
Can l lean on you ...
When life is hard?
Can l lean on you ...
When life is hard?
Oh, and life is hard
#Ad lib
#Signal from Mark
You can lie to me, baby
’Cause I’ll sure as hell lie to you (x2)
Tell me anything you want
But please don’t tell me we’re through
I don’t need to know who you were out with the other night
But if I was with another woman that would somehow kinda make it alright
That ain’t no reason not hold each other tight
Don’t tell me the truth!
When I look in your eyes!
Don’t tell me the truth!
’Cause I love your lies!
Give me the fiction
It’s reality I despise
#1x SOLO - Mark
What you doing honey
Coming here with all this proof?
I never signed up for this kind of abuse
I think the time has come
I gotta cut myself loose
Lie to me, baby
’Cause I’ll sure as hell lie to you (x2)
Tell me anything you want
But please don’t tell me we’re through
#SOLO x 2
#TURNAROUND x 2

songs.title: Mama (Kindergarten Blues)
songs.notes: Close: Break on 10 in last verse + bass outro

lyrics: Papa, when you gonna take me home?
I met a girl, and she stole my black cat bone
Oh Papa, how did I get here?
I went looking for love and you know it cost me dear.
Oh Papa, what can I do?
First she said she loved me and then she said we’re through
Papa! Papa! Papa! Papa! Papa! Papa! ...
#SOLO
Alle meine Entchen schwimmen auf dem See
Schwimmen auf dem See now Papa
Schwimmen auf dem See
Köpfchen in das Wasser
Schwänzchen in die Höh’
Oh Papa, when you gonna take me home?
My luck is fading, I don’t want to be alone
Papa! Papa! Papa! Papa!Papa! Papa! ...
#MK signals end...
#BREAK on 1/10 ⇒
Papa, please take me home
#BASS OUTRO 11-12
Well, Olivia is taken
But a look like hers can be found from time to time (x2)
I’m thinking something like Olivia
Is what I need to find
There’s only one man in this world
Who gets to sleep with her by his side (x2)
I’m thinking something like Olivia
Could keep me through the night
#SOLO x 2
Now I’m not trying to steal
No love away from no one man (x2)
But if Olivia herself were at my door
I’d have to say, I’d let her in
Something like Olivia (x4)
I keep thinking something like Olivia
Is what I need to find
#1 SOLO
#STOP on 1/13
Talked to my baby on the telephone, she said
Stop what you’re doing and come on home
I can’t hold on ...
She said, daddy you can run, walk or fly
You’re my baby and I love you until the day I die
I can’t hold on …
Talk to me baby (Talk to me ...)
Talk to me baby
Talk to me baby
Talk to me baby
I get a real good feeling
Talking to you in the phone
#SOLO x 2
Oh Daddy, you’re mighty fine
You’re my baby you’re my lover, I hate to see you cry
I can’t hold on …
#(Last verse)
She said daddy, don’t you worry, don’t you cry
You know I love you baby, said you’re my heart’s desire
I can’t hold on …
Talk to me baby (Talk to me ...)
Talk to me baby
Talk to me baby
Talk to me baby
I get a real good feeling
Talking to you in the phone
#REPEAT
#1 SOLO
#Stop on 11
I was born on the wrong side of the line
Never thought that a girl like you would be mine
Life was hard, trouble was troubling me
Keep me warm in your love all the time
All that I knew
Was the lash of the storm
You showed me the summer showers
They were sweet and warm
#You showed me colours...
You showed me colours
Where there was just blue and grey
Led me out of the darkness
Into bright blessed day
#You know I was drowning...
You know I was drowning
’Til you pulled me back to the shore
I felt your love for the first time
And I needed more
#I was cold, so cold...
I was cold, so cold
’Til you put the fire in my heart
My race was ended
Then you brought me back to the start
#I was born...
I was born on the wrong side of the line
Never thought that a girl like you would be mine
Life was hard, trouble was troubling me
Keep me warm in your love all the time
#SOLO
My song was silenced
But you set it free
You took my blues
And you made them harmony
#I was hurting...
I was hurting, hurting
Girl, you soothed my pain
I let myself fall
And you caught me
Again and again and again and again
#I was born...
I was born on the wrong side of the line
I never dreamed that you would be mine
Now my troubles, they ain’t botherin’ me
Girl you saved me
from my destiny

songs.title: Kissing In The Dark
songs.notes: Close: Break and bass outro in last verse

lyrics: Call the doctor, call him quick
I done got something ’bout to make me sick
I been kissin’ in the dark...
Well, I had a girlfriend from Alabam’
She done put her pennies all in a jam
Kissin’ in the dark...
She had a date with a scrap, she met a hip cat
And nobody knows where she end up at
She been kissin’ in the dark...
#SOLO x 2
She had a date with a scrap, she met a hip cat
And nobody knows where she end up at
She been kissin’ in the dark...
Be a good pal, just swappin’ up a dime
You thinkin’ about a man, throw it after mine
Kissin’ in the dark...
Well, you’d better wake up, and try to get wise
Get yourself hip to that old crazy jive
Kissin’ in the dark...
#Bass outro bars 11-12
Hey Joe, where you going with that gun in your hand?
I’m going down to shoot my old lady
You know, I caught her messing around with another man
And that ain’t too cool
Hey Joe, I heard you shot your mama down
You shot her down now
Hey Joe, I heard you shot your lady down
Shot her down in the ground, yeah
Yeah. Yes, I did, I shot her
You know I caught her messin’ round, messin’ round town
And I gave her the gun. I shot her
Alright
Shoot her one more time again, baby
Yeah
Oh, dig it
Ah, alright
Hey, Joe
Where you gonna run to now? Where you gonna run to?
Well, dig
I’m goin’ way down south, way down to Mexico way
I’m goin’ way down south, where I can be free
Ain’t no one gonna find me
Ain’t no hangman gonna gonna put a rope around me
You better believe right now
Hey, Joe
You better run on down
Hey, hey, Joe
She’s like black coffee, black as my soul
Keeps heart racing, she burns like coal
Late at night when she’s next to me
She keeps me awake like pure caffeine
Drink it hot so it won’t never grow cold...
Drink it hot so it won’t never grow cold
I’m drinking black coffee before I grow old
In the warmth of the raging fire
She takes me higher and higher
I don’t need whiskey and I don’t need tea...
I don’t need whiskey and I don’t need tea
Black coffee gives me everything I need
It tastes so bitter but feels so sweet
Let me drink black coffee, I don’t need to eat
In the morning she’s as fresh as can be...
In the morning she’s as fresh as can be
She opens my eyes to all that I can see
Her love is so pure and kind
But black coffee’s all that’s on my mind
Black coffee, can’t you smell the aroma...
Black coffee, can’t you smell the aroma
I could tell you but it’s better if I show ya
Let me give one simple tip
Don’t gulp it down,
Enjoy it sip by sip
#SOLO
In the heat of the afterglow
We drink black coffee real slow
I asked her to make and she said she would
Her black coffee just tastes so good
Black coffee...
Black coffee
Black coffee
Hey, stay back with that milk!
Freedom Train, oh Freedom Train
Won’t you save this poor soul of mine?
I swear I heard you whistle
Please don’t you leave me behind
Won’t you show me the Ohio
And the green hills beyond?
Freedom Train, oh Freedom Train
Please listen to my song
Freedom Train, oh Freedom Train
Tell me it won’t be long
How long must I wait now
Before it’s time to move on?
My wife was sold to a trader
My son left his arm in the wheel
Freedom Train, oh Freedom Train
Please tell me salvation is real
I’m gonna ride that hidden railroad
Far from where I was born
Won’t you take me there?
Won’t you take me there?
Into a brighter dawn
Away from these burning fields
Away from pain and fear
Won’t you take me there?
Won’t you take me there?
I can’t face another year
Freedom Train, oh Freedom Train
I’ve been praying to the Lord for so long
To smile down in his mercy
And forgive me for what I did wrong
Well Moses parted the water
And set his people free
Now Freedom Train, oh Freedom Train
Won’t you please do the same for me?

songs.title: I Only Get The Blues With You

lyrics: "Wash them dishes. Now mow the lawn"
You’ve got me working since the break of dawn
It’s hard you know
And there’s something I’ve got to say to you
You know I love you woman
But I only get the blues with you
"Watch that truck!"
"There’s a kid on skates!"
"What gear are you in? "
"BREAK!!"
I’ve been driving thirty years
I don’t need your back-seat driver views
You know I love you woman
But I only get the blues with you
I married you in white,
raised our children too
Will you ever be proud of me
Like I’m scared of you?
It’s hard to think straight
With all this passive agressive you use
You know I love you woman
But I only get the blues with you
You’re my yin and my yang
My pleasure, my pain
My temptress and my torturer
The girl I never tamed
I wanna tiger in my tank
But instead you’re in my bed
Will you ever love
And stop messing with my head?
You say you love me
But you don’t know why
You say we stand a chance
But you don’t want to try
I don’t get you girl
What is it that you want me to do?
You know I love you woman
But I only get the blues with you
I was born in a trailer
On Poverty Road
Behind the levee
In the walnut grove
Despair was my midwife,
My constellation was pain
Every generation just the same
On Poverty Road
The American dream
On Poverty Road
Is a used pickup truck
And a clean set of clothes
My school was the street
The lesson was shame
Every generation just the same
On Poverty Road
{ A } The sun beating warm...
The sun beating warm
And the birds flying high
I watched them from the levee
But I never asked why
Those birds were so free and I was so poor
It just seemed to be a natural law
On Poverty Road
Don’t expect to live long
On Poverty Road
Reaping the drought
That my ancestors sowed
I lost the dice
In a loaded game
Every generation just the same
On Poverty Road
{ A } The sun beating warm...
The sun beating warm
And the birds flying high
I watched them from the levee
But I never asked why
Those birds were so free and I was so poor
It just seemed to be a natural law
On Poverty Road
I’m gonna take my own advice and treat you right (x2)
Gone are the days when I treated you mean
From now on I’m gonna treat you like a queen
I’m gonna take my own advice and treat you right
I’m gonna take my own advice and treat you good
I’m gonna treat you like a good man should
Now that I see that I treated you cruel
I’m gonna stop acting like that same stupid fool
I’m gonna take my own advice and treat you right
{ A } How could I risk...
How could I risk to make you go away
Tell myself to do everything
To make you want to stay
We’ve got to hold on to each other
In the troubled times
So please tell me honey
Tell me you’re still mine.
I’m gonna take my own advice and treat you fine
I’m gonna feed you caviar and the sweetest wine
I’m gonna buy you things until I’ve got no money
From now on your life is purest milk and honey
I’m gonna take my own advice and treat you right
I came home last night
There was a new lock on my door
You know it was one hell of a shock
My key wouldn’t fit the goddam lock
A message from my baby said
Don’t want you here no more
I asked myself
What have I done?
Lord knows I know she knows she was the only one
I loved her slow and I loved her good
Did everything that a grown man should
Now I asked myself
What have I done?
I worked hard
I did my 9 to 5 (x2)
I worked my fingers to the bone
Just to pay for our happy home
But that weren’t enough
To keep our love alive
You know I tried to be that man
I tried to keep her hand
I tried but that was not her plan
I tried
I tried to be that man
I tried to understand
I tried but she didn’t give a damn
I tried tried
I saw her out
And she was with another man
I saw her out on the town
And she was with another man
Back in the corner they were hugging and a-kissing
That’s the thing that I’ve been missing
And the wedding ring
Was missing from her hand
What have I done? (x6)
Lord knows I know she knows she was the only one
#INTRO
There’s only ash and flames where the forests used to stand
Where there were fields of grain there’s just dust and sand
Bare rocks where the glacier used to flow
But we keep on driving down this blistered road.
Oh Lord! Oh Lord!
When are we gonna learn?
The coral’s dying at a record pace
Islands are drowning and lakes are laid to waste
Oases drying in the desert sun
But it don’t seem to interest anyone
Oh Lord!
Oh Lord!
When are we all gonna learn?
You know it’s frightning and it feels so hard
We took Eden and made a junk yard
There’s hardly time to turn this thing around
We need to wise up before all hope is drowned
Fish are starving ’cause all they can eat
Is the plastic we thow at our feet
The air is filled with chemical fumes
If the heat don’t beat us our poisons will soon.
Oh Lord!
Oh Lord!
When are we all gonna learn?
Are we ever gonna learn
I met a girl, she was so fine
I decided to make her mine
I took her for a drink, she had a gin with a twist
And I leaned in just to give her a kiss
She said, ”Darling, don’t be in such a rush.
You can look, but don’t touch!”
We went to the movies...
We went to the movies to see some romance
Then to a nightclub ’cause she wanted to dance
I sidled up to her all subtle and slow
But then she said that she wanted to go
That’s when she showed me the gun in her clutch
And she warned me
“You can look, but don’t touch!”
I can’t see no reason...
I can’t see no reason for all this resistance
Why must I always keep my distance?
I know this girl is stringing me along
I don’t think anything ever felt quite so wrong
#SOLO
I went out and bought a ring
With a big diamond and plenty of bling
I got on my knee by candlelight
Yeah, I wanted to do everything just right
She saw that rock and said,
“It’s really too much!l
I said, ”I know, that’s why you can look,
But don’t touch!”

songs.title: Baby What You Want Me To Do
songs.notes: Close: Break and bass outro in last verse

lyrics: I’m going up, going down
You got me running, you got me hiding
#SOLO x 2
I’m going up, going down
You got me peepin’, you got me hiding
#BREAK on 1/10 ⇒
#BASS OUTRO 11-12
I done ran into my baby
And finally found my old blue jean
I done ran into my baby
And finally found my old blue jean
Well, I could tell that they was mine
From the oil and the gasoline
If I ever get back my blue jeans
Lord, how happy could one man be
If I ever get back my blue jeans
Lord, how happy could one man be
’Cause if I get back those blue jeans
You know, my baby be bringin’ ’em home to me
I got a sly dog / Sniffin’ at my door
Eying up my woman / Beggin’ on the floor
He ain’t got no leash / He completely wild
Drive my woman crazy like some feral child
I got a sly dog
But I don’t know what for
I got a sly dog
Sniffin’ at my door
I got a cool cat / Strutting round my space
Acting like he owns / The whole damn place
Rubs up against my leg / Prowls throughout the house
But that mangy creature, he can’t even catch a mouse
I got a cool cat baby
But I don’t know what for
I got a sly dog
Sniffin’ at my door
#SOLO x2
I got a talking bird repeats everything I say
Squawks the F-word at me until I go away
My girl’s folks came to visit
They didn’t like what they heard
I lost my girl because of that F-word bird
I got a talking chicken
I don’t know what for
Gonna feed it to that egg suckin’ dog
That’s sniffin’ at my door
I got a wild woman / I found her in a sack
I let her out and she just followed me back
She says she can’t clean the dishes
And she won’t sweep the floor
She just eats all my food and then she cries out for more
Yeah I got a wild woman
I don’t know what for
And I’ve got a sly dog
And that sly dog is sniffin’ at my door
#2 SOLI, stop on 11

Oh Mama, how did I get here?
Oh Mama, how did I get here?
I went looking for love and you know it cost me dear.
Oh Mama, what can I do?
Oh Mama, what can I do?
First she said she loved me and then she said we’re through
Mama! Mama! Mama! Mama! Mama! Mama! ...

songs.title: Can’t You See
songs.notes: Close: chorus vamp, break on signal

lyrics: Gonna take a freight train
Down at the station
I don’t care where it goes
Gonna climb a mountain
The highest mountain
Gonna jump right off
No one’s gonna know
Can’t you see, can’t you see
What that woman been doin’ to me
Can’t you see, can’t you see
What that woman been doin’ to me
I’m gonna find me
A hole in the wall
Gonna crawl inside and I'm gonna die
’Cause my lady
Now a mean old woman
Never told me goodbye
Can’t you see, can’t you see
What that woman been doin’ to me
Can’t you see, can’t you see
What that woman been doin’ to me
#The neverending solo!
Gonna buy a ticket, as far as I can go
And I ain’t ever coming back
Gonna take the southbound, all the way to Georgia
’Til the train runs out of track
Can’t you see, can’t you see
What that woman been doin’ to me
Can’t you see, can’t you see
What that woman...
#BREAK
been doin’ to me
Used to spend my nights out in a barroom
Liquor was the only love I’ve known
But you rescued me from reachin’ for the bottom
And brought me back from being too far gone
You’re as smooth as Tennessee whiskey
You’re as sweet as strawberry wine
You’re as warm as a glass of brandy
And honey, I stay stoned on your love all the time
I’ve looked for love in all the same old places
Found the bottom of a bottle always dry
But when you poured out your heart I didn’t waste it
Cause there’s nothing like your love to get me high
You’re as smooth as Tennessee whiskey
You’re as sweet as strawberry wine
You’re as warm as a glass of brandy
And honey, I stay stoned on your love all the time
#SOLO x2
You’re as expensive as Tennessee whiskey
You’re as sickly as strawberry wine
You vgive me heartburn like a glass of brandy
But it's okay, it's okay.
No, it's fine!
You’re as smooth as Tennessee whiskey
You’re as sweet as strawberry wine
You’re as warm as a glass of brandy
And honey, I stay stoned on your love all the time
#repeat, close on 2nd chorus

songs.title: Midnight Special
songs.notes: Close: Break and vocals in chorus

lyrics: Let the midnight special
Shine a light on me
Let the midnight special
Shine its ever-loving light on me
Well, you wake up in the morning, hear the working bell ring
And they march you to the table, you see the same old thing
Ain’t no food upon the table, and no pork in the pan
But you better not complain, boy
You get in trouble with the man
Let the midnight special
Shine a light on me (x3)...
Let the midnight special
Shine its ever-loving light on me
If you’re ever in Houston, well, you better do right
You better not gamble, and you better not fight
Or the sheriff will grab you, and the boys will bring you down
The next thing you know, boy
You’ll be prison bound
Let the midnight special
Shine a light on me (x3)...
Let the midnight special
Shine its ever-loving light on me
#SOLO
Yonder come Miss Rosie, how in the world do you know?
Well, I know her by her apron and the dress she wore
Umbrella on her shoulder, piece of paper in her hand
She come to see the gov’nor
Ask him to free her man
Let the midnight special
Shine a light on me (x3)...
Let the midnight special
Shine its ever-loving light on me
If you go down to Mar-A-Lago, check out the boxes in the John
They’re full of secrets and launch codes
World War Three, bring it on!
Oh, I met Miss Rosie down there, things didn’t go as she had planned
She felt something lifting up her skirt
Lord, it was the President’s hand
Let the midnight special
Shine a light on me (x3)...
Let the midnight special
Shine its ever-loving light on me
Let the midnight special shine a light on me
Let the midnight special...
#BREAK
...shine a light
on me

songs.title: It’s Not My Cross to Bear

lyrics: I have not come
To testify
About our bad, bad misfortune
And I ain’t here a-wonderin’ why
But I’ll live on and I’ll be strong
’Cause it’s not my cross to bear
I sat down and wrote you a long letter
It was just the other day
Said, 'Sure as the sunrise, baby'
Tomorrow I’ll be up and on my way
But I’ll live on and I’ll be strong
’Cause it’s not my cross to bear
#SOLO
But I’ll live on and I’ll be strong
’Cause it’s not my cross to bear
But in the end, baby
Long towards the end of your road
Don’t reach out for me, baby
’Cause I’m not gonna carry your load
But I’ll live on and I’ll be strong
’Cause it’s not my cross to bear
I found someone else, baby
Yeah, yeah ...
Yeah, go on by
My baby, uh-huh
Yeah, yeah, yeah
Yeah, babe
Yeah, yeah
Tell me girl, what have we done?
Where have all the good times gone?
Great days of passion, fulfilling our needs
And horny nights in sweaty sheets
It had to be once for eternity
But everything’s changed into monotony
Is this really what I’m meant to be?
I refuse to believe in this destiny
I’m still a man, I do what I can
To keep the wheels turning and keep my soul burning
I’m still a man, just kickin’ the can
Sometimes I rock, never give up
I do what I can, like you give a damn!
I’m still a man
This boring job kills me every day
A circus of fools just stands in my way
They lost their convictions a long time ago
Corporate messiahs and their embarrassing shows
Now look at them losers fanning the flames
I don’t wanna play those hustlers’ games
I still wanna look myself straight in the eye
Feel some pride in my heart and hold my head high
’Cause I’m still a man, I do what I can
To keep the wheels turning and keep my soul burning
I’m still a man, just kickin’ the can
sometimes I rock, never give up
I do what I can, like you give a damn!
I’m still a man
Hey bartender, give me a beer
Outside it’s a dark night, so let me stay here
My bed is cold and empty
Cause my baby’s gone
I’m gonna keep warm here, before the night is done
Hey bartender, give me one more drink
I'm as drunk as I look, but I'm as sober as I think
Was it the mail man
That she took on the run
No matter at all, when the night is done
#SOLO
Hey bartender, give me another glass
By the end of the night, I hope the blues will pass
Do you know
Where my old friends have been gone
Wanna meet Johnny and The Captain, before the night is done
Hey bartender, leave that bottle here
With my friends by my side, I got nothing fear
They always take care of me
Like I'm the only one
They never judge me, never trick me
When the night is done
Hey bartender, I'll see you again
I’m done with that chick, I’m done with the shame
Now I’m a free man,
Free as a man on the run
So Lord, don’t bring her back to me
When the night is done
I tried to show you that I love you
But I never got it right
Now the door is closed behind you
And my chest is feeling tight
You chose to never ask the questions
So I didn't have to say
The truth that hid inside the silence
Couldn't save us anyway
Gone is the pleasure
All that's left is the pain
Everything lost and nothing to gain
I stare out through the window pane
My tears are falling down like rain
Falling down like rain
On the first day that I saw you
I could hardly breathe
I was blinded by the wonder
Of who I thought you'd be
As we walked along the sunset
We didn't see the signs
That as we traced the growing shadows
We also drew the lines
Gone is the pleasure
All that's left is the pain
Everything lost and nothing to gain
I stare out through the window pane
My tears are falling down like rain
Falling down like rain
I felt the blessing, let it
Turn right into a curse
I found the treasure without
Seeing it's worth
I took the sunlight and I
Drowned it out in the rain
And given the chance I know I'll
Do it over again
I don't recall a moment
When our love began to pale
The days were cold, the nights stretched on
Before we drove the final nail
I light a flame to chase the silence
Then I watch it burning down
And hope that somewhere in the darkness
I will find something profound
Gone is the pleasure
All that's left is the pain
Everything lost and nothing to gain
I stare out through the window pane
My tears are falling down like rain
Falling down like rain
Falling down like rain

lyrics: Tell me who's been fooling you?
Tell the truth
Who's been fooling you?
There you sit there looking so cool
While the whole show is passing you by
Better come to terms with your fellow men soon cause
Whole world is shaking now, can't you feel it?
A New dawn is breaking now, can't you see it?
Tell the Truth
Tell me who's been fooling you?
Tell the truth
Who's been fooling you?
It doesn't matter just who you are
Or where you're going or been
Open your eyes and look into your heart
Whole world is shaking now, I can feel it
New dawn is breaking now, I can see it
I can see it, yeah. I can see it
I can see it, yeah. I can see it
I can see it, yeah.
Whoo!
